00050 namespace SimSite3D{

00053   class hbond_ideal_point_t;
00054   typedef dir_point_storage<hbond_ideal_point_t>        hbond_ideal_pt_vec;
00055   typedef hbond_ideal_pt_vec::iterator                  hbond_ideal_pt_vi;
00056   typedef hbond_ideal_pt_vec::const_iterator            hbond_ideal_pt_vci;
00057 
00059   class hbond_point_t : public dir_point_t{
00060   public:
00061     hbond_point_t(alloc_t a = ALLOC_POSITION) : dir_point_t(a)
00062     {
00063       act_type = UNKNOWN_INTERACTION;
00064       atom = atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI;
00065     }
00066 
00067     hbond_point_t(const hbond_point_t& p) : dir_point_t(p)
00068     {
00069       do_copy(p); 
00070     }
00071 
00072     const hbond_point_t& 
00073     operator=(const hbond_point_t& p)
00074     {
00075       if(&p != this){
00076         do_copy(p);
00077         dir_point_t::operator= (p);
00078       }
00079       return *this;
00080     }
00081     ~hbond_point_t() { ; }
00082 
00083     static bool
00084     cmp(const hbond_point_t &A, const hbond_point_t &B)
00085     { return A.act_type < B.act_type; }
00086 
00087     const SimSite3D::atom_t&
00088     __get_atom() const
00089     { return *atom; }
00090 
00091     const SimSite3D::hbond_ideal_point_t&
00092     __get_ideal_pt() const
00093     { return *ideal_pt; }
00094 
00095     interactionType act_type; 
00096     hbond_ideal_pt_vci ideal_pt;  
00097     atom_vci atom;            
00098   private:
00099     void
00100     do_copy(const hbond_point_t& p)
00101     {
00102       act_type = p.act_type;
00103       ideal_pt = p.ideal_pt;
00104       atom = p.atom;
00105     }
00106   };
00107 
00108   typedef dir_point_storage<hbond_point_t>      hbond_fit_pt_vec;
00109   typedef hbond_fit_pt_vec::iterator            hbond_fit_pt_vi;
00110   typedef hbond_fit_pt_vec::const_iterator      hbond_fit_pt_vci;

00113   class hbond_ideal_pt_base : public dir_point_t{
00114   public:
00115     hbond_ideal_pt_base(alloc_t a = ALLOC_POSITION) : dir_point_t(a)
00116     {
00117       pt_num = 0;
00118       act_type = UNKNOWN_INTERACTION;
00119       atom = atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI;
00120       carbon_nbr = atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI;
00121       second_nbr = atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI;
00122     }
00123 
00124     hbond_ideal_pt_base(const atom_vci hbond_atom, const atom_vci C_nbr_atom, 
00125                         const atom_vci second_nbr_atom, 
00126                         const BoundingVolume& site_vol, const int cap_number, 
00127                         const bool include_metals = false, 
00128                         const alloc_t a = ALLOC_POSITION) : dir_point_t(a)
00129     {
00130       pt_num = cap_number;
00131       //act_type = UNKNOWN_INTERACTION;
00132       atom = hbond_atom;
00133       carbon_nbr = C_nbr_atom;
00134       second_nbr = second_nbr_atom;
00135     }
00136 
00137     hbond_ideal_pt_base(const hbond_ideal_pt_base& p) : dir_point_t(p)
00138     {
00139       do_copy(p);
00140     }
00141 
00142     const hbond_ideal_pt_base&
00143     operator=(const hbond_ideal_pt_base& p)
00144     {
00145       if(&p != this){
00146         do_copy(p);
00147         dir_point_t::operator= (p);
00148       }
00149       return *this;
00150     }
00151 
00152     virtual ~hbond_ideal_pt_base() { ; }
00153 
00154     static bool
00155     cmp(const hbond_ideal_pt_base &A, const hbond_ideal_pt_base &B)
00156     { return A.act_type < B.act_type; }
00157 
00158     const SimSite3D::atom_t&
00159     __get_atom() const
00160     { return *atom; }
00161 
00162     const SimSite3D::atom_t&
00163      __get_carbon_nbr() const
00164      { return *carbon_nbr; }
00165 
00166     uint pt_num;              
00167     interactionType act_type; 
00168     atom_vci atom;            
00169     atom_vci carbon_nbr;      
00170     atom_vci second_nbr;      
00171 
00172   private:
00173 
00174     void
00175     do_copy(const hbond_ideal_pt_base& p)
00176     {
00177       pt_num = p.pt_num;
00178       act_type = p.act_type;
00179       atom = p.atom;
00180       carbon_nbr = p.carbon_nbr;
00181       second_nbr = p.second_nbr;
00182     }
00183 
00184   };

00186 
00188   class hbond_ideal_point_t : public hbond_ideal_pt_base{
00189   public:
00190     hbond_ideal_point_t(alloc_t a = ALLOC_POSITION) : hbond_ideal_pt_base(a)
00191     {
00192       pt_num = 0;
00193       act_type = UNKNOWN_INTERACTION;
00194       // problem with iterators is cannot initialize atom to anything 
00195       // safe/usefull
00196     }
00197 
00198     hbond_ideal_point_t(const hbond_ideal_point_t& p) : hbond_ideal_pt_base(p)
00199     {
00200       do_copy(p);
00201     }
00202 
00203     const hbond_ideal_point_t&
00204     operator=(const hbond_ideal_point_t& p)
00205     {
00206       if(this != &p){
00207         do_copy(p);
00208         hbond_ideal_pt_base::operator= (p);
00209       }
00210       return *this;
00211     }
00212 
00213     ~hbond_ideal_point_t() { ; }
00214 
00215     hbond_fit_pt_vci fit_pts_beg;  
00216     hbond_fit_pt_vci fit_pts_end;  
00217   private:
00218     void
00219     do_copy(const hbond_ideal_point_t& p)
00220     {
00221       fit_pts_beg = p.fit_pts_beg;
00222       fit_pts_end = p.fit_pts_end;
00223     }
00224   };
